### [Showdownjs - A markdown to HTML converter](http://showdownjs.com/)

[showdownjs.com](http://showdownjs.com/)

[](https://www.google.com/search?safe=active&sxsrf=ALeKk03A7XPJiJ1dVOcEb6XSfnQYYufrbg%3A1614157468668&ei=nBY2YMWuKIbB-wTk4KygCQ&q=markdown+to+html+with+js#)

1. [](http://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:b7twIWXorkEJ:showdownjs.com/+&cd=3&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=ca)

Showdown is a *Javascript Markdown to HTML* bidirectional converter, based on the original works by John Gruber. Showdown can be used client side (in the browser) or server side (with nodejs). See it working in the live demo!

[](https://ourcodeworld.com/articles/read/396/how-to-convert-markdown-to-html-in-javascript-using-remarkable)
